name: LitMan All Nude
description:
[quote]Latest Update. Dev Kit Version 622975.39737.[/quote]

[b]All Human NPC Are Nude. Male and Female.[/b]

Mod respects Gameplay Nudity settings - None, Partial or Full. You need to set Gameplay Nudity settings accordingly.

Does not work with "LitMan Only Nude Women", "LitMan All Entertainers Nude Women".

Support Channel on Discord: https://discord.gg/THtpzP5

I released all my Source files on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods if anyone wants to keep updated those Mods or release own ones.

If you would like to Donate feel free to do so on Paypal https://www.paypal.me/kasperaitis

Mod ID: 910895723
